meanings.definition: A small, burrowing rodent native to Eurasia.
meanings.sent1: The sousliks dug tunnels in the ground to make their homes.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of sousliks scurrying around in the field.
meanings.sent3: The sousliks had a meeting underground to discuss their next adventure.
meanings.sent4: The sousliks were like tiny explorers, venturing into the unknown depths of the earth.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the cute sousliks popping in and out of their burrows.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'souslik'.
meanings.sent1: There were many sousliks playing together in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The sousliks were a lively bunch, always chattering and playing.
meanings.sent3: The sousliks decided to form a band and play music for the forest animals.
meanings.sent4: The sousliks, like a tiny army, stood united against any intruders.
meanings.sent5: The sousliks' burrow was filled with the sounds of their cheerful chatter.

meanings.definition: To refer to a group of sousliks.
meanings.sent1: Let's sousliks this area on the map to mark where we saw them.
meanings.sent2: I sousliksed the location of the burrow so we can find it again.
meanings.sent3: We sousliksed the spot with a flag to remember where the sousliks live.
meanings.sent4: She sousliksed the path with breadcrumbs to guide us back to the sousliks' home.
meanings.sent5: The children sousliksed the tree with colorful ribbons to show where the sousliks liked to play.
